intro: Vimen retusa, commonly known as the smooth vimen, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are often glossy and dark green. It produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters, which attract various pollinators. The fruit is a small capsule that contains several seeds, typical of the Rubiaceae family.
